modName: Iron Man Mk V Nightingale version
summary: Iron Man Mk V re textured Nightingale Armour
descriptionHtml:
Armor is standalone! No longer replaces Nightingale; now called 'Iron Man Mk V'.
Feel free to rename, as the set is unenchanted.
All four pieces can only be crafted at the Sky Forge with Iron Ingots & Steel Ingots.
All four pieces can be improved at a Workbench with said materials.

**************************************************
Description:This is a Silver and Red variant of the Nightingale armor set based on Iron Man Mk V's Costume , utilizing the Cape-less Variant meshes and The Stark Helmet meshes.
(Huge thanks to Gilead Maerlyn for their work on the Cape-less Variant and Venarez's Stark Helmet, respectively.)
**************************************************
This is for Male Only.

**************************************************
Installation:
Simply extract the archive into the Skyrim folder, so the .esp, textures folder, and meshes folder all land into your skyrim/data directory.
Typically:
C:/Program Files/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim

C:/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim


Credits:
Gilead Maerlyn for his work and knowledge on transparencies. If you don't like anything hanging from the back, consider his Capeless Nightingale mod:
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1560

Venarez for his Work and knowledge on creating the meshes for the Stark Helmet.
author: wanoo99
